info.name: 2017 YouTube Fixed Like/Dislike Bar
info.description: Green good, Red bad. It's very simple, Google. You even wrote this on your material design website.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1 - YouTube modified the HTML so that the like bar is in a container. That container is now the new place for the red background.
v1.0 - I'm sure that one day, I'll either won't need this or YouTube will render it obsolete.

data.title: Like bar is blue when you like or dislike a video (material design)
